alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 2:13PM MST until December 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, with potential for up to 25 inches * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected on all mountain routes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow accumulation will approach or exceed 2 inches per hour at times overnight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
